Taunton.Albert Sweet House:
The Albert Sweet House is a historic house located at 179 Highland Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 1-1/2 story, wood-framed house was built sometime in the 1870s, and is a particularly picturesque example of Second Empire styling. It has a mansard roof, with bracketed gable dormers framing round-arch windows, and an off-center entry topped by a 2-1/2 level tower.
